segments.text: I needed some money , so I hocked it last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You must have been really hurting for cash to have done that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had just enough money to make ends meet until payday . Then last Wednesday I received a phone bill to the tune of $ 195.00 . I hit the ceiling when I saw that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds like you weren't expecting that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd forgotten that my brother had used my phone earlier this month to call his girlfriend . He forgot to mention that she happened to be in New York at the time 3000 miles away .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you need some money to tide you over until payday , I can loan you some .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , but tomorrow's payday I can make until then . Thanks any-way .
segments.speaker: S2
